dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
V. Nair
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR-10 dataset, one of the most widely used datasets for machine learning research, is a unique resource that offers a robust benchmark for algorithms, primarily image recognition. The dataset is a curated collection of 60,000 color images, each of a size of 32x32 pixels, uniformly divided across ten distinctive classes.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: J. Deng
W. Dong
R. Socher
L.-J. Li
K. Li
L. Fei-Fei
dcterms:description: The ImageNet-1K dataset, a subset of the more extensive ImageNet database, has become an essential resource for research in machine learning, particularly for image recognition and classification tasks. ImageNet-1K is an extensively curated dataset of approximately 1.28 million high-resolution color images spread across 1,000 distinct categories.
dcterms:title: ImageNet-1K

dcterms:creator: S. Merity
C. Xiong
J. Bradbury
R. Socher
dcterms:description: The WikiText-2 dataset is a significant benchmark for various natural language processing tasks, specifically those related to language modeling. It comprises over 2 million tokens extracted from verified Wikipedia articles.
dcterms:title: WikiText-2

dcterms:creator: M. Cramer
N. Haala
dcterms:description: The Vaihingen dataset is a land covering remote sensing dataset. Its purpose is to segment correctly aerial images of the Vaihingen city in Germany.
dcterms:title: Vaihingen
